Job responsibilities
Conducting the topographical survey to collect the existing details for the designing of Railways, highways, major roads, sewer and drainage systems and other infrastructure works using
GPS (Leica,Trimple,Kolida,Topcon) and Total station (Trimble,Topcon, Leica, Pentax, Kolida Sokkia and Nikon) and downloading the data and plotting in the AutoCAD . Setting-out and leveling works of Buildings, Railways all types
of highways, roads including sub-base,roadbase, base course and wearing course and all type of infrastructure works like sewerage and storm water network, Potable water, irrigation, and Telephone networks and laying of HV and LV cables.
Preparation of contour drawings, shop drawings and as built drawings, Earthwork cross sections, existing and proposed service details, utility services, structural details for water works
and concrete structures, cable laying details of Electrical and street lighting works, updating progress layout defining each activity ACHIEVED HIGHLY CUTTING : 33,86,233.88 MeterCube (Railway) Computer awareness
